conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D extrusions of the 2D layout in an isometric projection.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clearly defined wall thickness and floor planes.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate room adjacency and wall positions; windows and doors generally align with the original floor plan, though some minor wall partition simplifications occur in the bathroom area.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture blocks are present in the correct rooms (beds in Bed 2, 3, 4 and sofa in Activity) with appropriate scale.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean render with professional lighting and consistent material usage. No UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of the utility/WC wall partitions compared to the floor plan.

summary: A high-fidelity 3D conversion that meticulously maintains the geometric logic and furniture layout of the original architectural drawing.
